text:
I would like to create an custom Path, which would download the jars from a
repository (like maven), offline-caching, etc.

Due to the implementation of list() method and the private elements declaration
I cannot really subclass the Path.
creator: lkishalmi@ovi.com
mbenson@apache.org
text:
Path has been significantly refactored in 1.7 (HEAD).  Additionally, most places
in Ant core where a Path would be allowed now support generic
ResourceCollections so it is possible you could simply implement your own.  Is
this satisfactory?

maybe it's my own prejudice towards the resource collection stuff, but since my
query got no response I'll assume the answer was "yes."
creator: mbenson@apache.org
